title: Les boules, Plate 11 from "Les Toquades"
marks:
Title, stamp and inscription

LLC, in the plate: LRC, in pencil: [Les Boules 2039]
description: man in foreground seen from back, crouching, holding lawn bowling balls; three men stand in background at R beside other balls on ground
creditline: Gift of funds from John E. Andrus III
